niagara.query_engine
Class TupleSchema

java.lang.Object
  niagara.query_engine.TupleSchema

public class TupleSchema
extends java.lang.Object

A tuple schema maps attribute/variable names to tuple positions.

Field Summary
private  int length
          Length of the tuple
private  java.util.HashMap name2pos
          Maps variable name to tuple position
private  java.util.HashMap name2var
          Maps variable name to variable
private  java.util.HashMap pos2name
          Maps tuple position to variable name

 int[] mapPositions(TupleSchema ts)
          Returns an array where the i-th element contains the position of the i-th variable of ts in this schema
